channel.title: 嘿哟~~印度超级高铁的梦想在内华达沙漠成形
channel.description: 嘿哟~~印度超级高铁的梦想在内华达沙漠成形

item.title: 嘿哟~~印度超级高铁的梦想在内华达沙漠成形[0-50]
item.description:
嘿哟~~印度超级高铁的梦想在内华达沙漠成形 india's hyperloop dream takes shape in Nevada desert印度超级高铁的梦想在内华达沙漠“成形”NEW DELHI: India's hyperloop dream moved one step closer to reality with the Maharashtra government on Thursday approving the Virgin Hyperloop-DP World (VHO-DPW) consortium as the "original project proponent" of the proposed hyperloop track between Mumbai and Pune. "Maharashtra will create the first hyperloop transportation system in the world and a global hyperloop supply chain starting from Pune," chief minister Devendra Fadnavis said.新德里：随着马哈拉斯特拉邦政府周四批准维珍（VHO-DPW）为孟买至普纳超级高铁的“原始项目支持方”，印度的超级高铁梦想离现实又近了一步。该邦首席部长Devendra Fadnavis表示，马哈拉斯特拉邦将修建世界第一条超级高铁，全球超级高铁供应链将从普纳开始。http://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-08-06/e8989f5275a1553f74fafb5424d15574.jpghttp://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-08-06/cbf849b2dd78bb284c03ef23455d9863.jpg以下是印度时报读者的评论：译文来源：三泰虎 http://www.santaihu.com/48185.html外文：http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/Aam Aadmi•Unknown•3 days ago
Will transform entire transportation system超级高铁能给整个交通系统带来翻天覆地的变革
Nikhil•3 days ago •Follow
There is major issue with Hyperloop which experts are raising but not answered by these companies. A single puncture in whole length can stop whole line in worst case whole tube will implode like crushed can. It can be by a bullet or explosion.专家提出了目前修建超级高铁面临的一些主要问题，没有得到这些公司的回答。沿线只要有一个地方出问题，整条超级高铁就会瘫痪。更严重的是，整个超级高铁管道可能爆炸
reality checker•3 days ago
hahahaha india needs toilet not hyper loop , look at ur gdp and population , hahahahahahahahahhahahaa哈哈，印度现在需要的是厕所，不是超级高铁。看看你们的GDP才多少，人口又那么多，哈哈
Meredilkisuno•mumbai•3 days ago
It is good news,India is trying to move ahead with new technology.Safety first.Bullock-cart mentality guys may object.太好了。印度这是在采用新技术，这是在前进。安全第一。那些天天说坐牛车好的家伙也许会反对
azbz969•Location•3 days ago
Why in Nevada desert? We have a good desert in Rajasthan.为什么在内华达沙漠“成形”？我们拉贾斯坦邦也有大沙漠啊，随便你们玩
Indian cow•cow land•3 days ago
Someone is trying to milk the Indian cow here, which is already skinny and starving. Have mercy有些人又想来挤奶了，印度这头奶牛已经瘦骨嶙峋、饥肠辘辘了，
looper•USA•3 days ago
Even if successful, not speed wise but FINANCIALLY and safely, it''s all US technology, just like Japanese bullet train, Toyota, Suzuki. What are Indians boasting and celebrating here?即便成功了，那也是美国技术啊。类似日本帮助印度修高铁，丰田车、铃木车等等印度人在这里吹嘘啥呢，庆祝啥呢？
sauvaneer flamme•3 days ago
Ha anyone seen even land acquisition for the project in Maharastra another jhumla by BJP大家有谁看到马哈拉斯特拉在为超级高铁项目征地吗？
sauvaneer flamme•3 days ago •Follow
Just before maharsatra elections nice paid article by BJP马哈拉斯特拉很快要进行选举了，这是人民党请人写的文章
sauvaneer flamme•3 days ago •Follow
Where is make in india if it is being made in us这是美国制造啊，印度制造在哪里呢？
Vareechan Kadavil•Bu Thina•3 days ago
These technologies are not new for India, in the Vedic period we had much more advanced technologies. Foreign invasions ruined all这些技术对印度不算什么。在吠陀时期，我们有太多太多先进技术了。外国入侵，毁掉了印度的一切
U324266v U324266v•3 days ago
Country that plans to send man to the moon, chandraayan 2 and all the fluff around it - has to outsource Hyperloop because they can’t build it? Now you know who is behind India’s space program.一个计划把人送上月球的国家，一个已经发射“月船2号”的国家，现在要让别国帮忙造超级高铁，理由是自己不会造？现在大家知道印度太空计划背后都是些谁在支持吧
item.content:encoded:
狒狗:
嘿哟~~印度超级高铁的梦想在内华达沙漠成形
india's hyperloop dream takes shape in Nevada desert印度超级高铁的梦想在内华达沙漠“成形”NEW DELHI: India's hyperloop dream moved one step closer to reality with the Maharashtra government on Thursday approving the Virgin Hyperloop-DP World (VHO-DPW) consortium as the "original project proponent" of the proposed hyperloop track between Mumbai and Pune. "Maharashtra will create the first hyperloop transportation system in the world and a global hyperloop supply chain starting from Pune," chief minister Devendra Fadnavis said.新德里：随着马哈拉斯特拉邦政府周四批准维珍（VHO-DPW）为孟买至普纳超级高铁的“原始项目支持方”，印度的超级高铁梦想离现实又近了一步。该邦首席部长Devendra Fadnavis表示，马哈拉斯特拉邦将修建世界第一条超级高铁，全球超级高铁供应链将从普纳开始。http://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-08-06/e8989f5275a1553f74fafb5424d15574.jpghttp://i.santaihu.com/india/2019-08-06/cbf849b2dd78bb284c03ef23455d9863.jpg以下是印度时报读者的评论：译文来源：三泰虎 http://www.santaihu.com/48185.html外文：http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/Aam Aadmi•Unknown•3 days ago
Will transform entire transportation system超级高铁能给整个交通系统带来翻天覆地的变革

There is major issue with Hyperloop which experts are raising but not answered by these companies. A single puncture in whole length can stop whole line in worst case whole tube will implode like crushed can. It can be by a bullet or explosion.专家提出了目前修建超级高铁面临的一些主要问题，没有得到这些公司的回答。沿线只要有一个地方出问题，整条超级高铁就会瘫痪。更严重的是，整个超级高铁管道可能爆炸

Even if successful, not speed wise but FINANCIALLY and safely, it''s all US technology, just like Japanese bullet train, Toyota, Suzuki. What are Indians boasting and celebrating here?即便成功了，那也是美国技术啊。类似日本帮助印度修高铁，丰田车、铃木车等等印度人在这里吹嘘啥呢，庆祝啥呢？

cosx:
